All the positive reviews pretty much sums it all up.  This place rocks.  If you are scared of crowds, have trouble asserting yourself and don't like to make friends with strangers, this is not your place.BUT, If you like cheap and tasty bubbly, fatty bacalao sandwiches (bocadillo) and don't mind meeting a new friends from all over the world (ok, I have a flare for talking people up), then you HAVE to come here.  I could eat a rich little bacalao sandwich  right now :dMy life's enjoyment includes eating at places like this - well crafted food served casually and working people prices.  Tips:  They closed at 22:00 (earlier than the rest of the whole darn city). To avoid the insane crowds, go earlier in the day.  Enjoy this place and the rest of Barcelona!
